name: list_project_files
description: Recursively scans a project directory for files, supporting directory exclusion and file type inclusion filters. Returns files as a list of string paths.

dir.description: The root directory to scan. Defaults to the project root if not provided.

exclude.description: List of directory names or substrings to exclude (e.g., ['venv', '.venv', '__pycache__', 'models']).

include.description: List of file extensions to include (e.g., ['.py', '.md', '.toml', '.yaml', '.json']).
